Package com.jalios.jcmsplugin.esn.activity

Class ActivityEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jalios.jcmsplugin.esn.activity.ActivityEntry
  • public class ActivityEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    ActivityEntry is a non persisted object that is used as a View in activity stream
    Since:
    esn-3.1.2
    Author:
    bransard
